name: 2kings
text: A comment left by 2kings was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, cryptfiend85, luckypyjamas, ferdinand, abe)

name: abe
text: Teodor has boobies pass it on.

name: ambala
text: Perhaps Lyle thinks they should go find a taco stand?

name: reburn
text: Lyle is cool with aggressive man love, as long as the act is not committed on the sofa.

name: m3funkyb
text: i remember when people still liked to get naked to do ordinary things....

name: redheron
text: It stopped happening?

name: fakedaisies
text: You're just not hanging out with the right people.

name: saint
text: You'd like Europe.

name: overmedicated
text: We English are about as uncomfortable with nudism as it is physically possible to be uncomfortable with something.

name: history
text: Yet, oddly, not nearly as uncomfortable with men in women's clothing.  Care to explain that?

name: overmedicated
text: The loss of an empire does strange things to people. Just look what it did to the Japanese.

name: history
text: I can't wait until the US loses it's empire...we are messed up now, can't even imagine what will happen.

name: soticoto
text:
We're leaving together
but still it's farewell
and maybe we'll come back,
to earth, who can tell?

I guess there is no one to blame
we're leaving ground (leaving ground)
will things ever be the same again?
IT'S THE FINAL COUNTDOWN!

*whistles*

name: delzhand
text: A comment left by delzhand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SSDDR, arkher, miaou)

name: chrisb
text: Early strips interestingly feature nudity as the primary "gag" or "joke".  This reveals much of the author's mind state at the time.

name: flynn
text: T has the weirdest body, even for a stuffed bear.

name: a_dude
text: Teodor is comfortable with himself.

name: magb
text: Yes, but why?

name: redheron
text: why not?

name: tekende
text: Well, maybe others aren't comfortable with his body. Maybe he should think of that sometime.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Mr. Bear is too dignified to run around in the buff!

name: f1shst1ck
text: I wish Lyle lived in my apartment

name: theunity
text: Is sort of scenario common in your apartment?

name: qatipay
text: Teodor's preoccupation with exercise was revealed early on.

name: jaiden
text: I love the fact that Teodor still leaves his headband on.

name: patkun
text: I guess if you're a teddy bear, around the backyard is probably a reasonably decent jog...

name: evolume
text: "GRUNT"

name: benhead
text:
Really, you'd think with how into exercise he is, simply bending over to pull his pants down wouldn't cause him to grunt.

Unless it's...something ELSE...

name: chuchurocket
text: i love how teodor's torso is surprised.

name: asinineuser
text: Lyle's "?" is so not Onstad.

name: nice-on-water
text: So Mutt and Jeff.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: This robe is my only outfit. Corny knows how to live.

name: gsurge
text: Alt text:

name: all-star951
text: I need to chubby you but I have run out. V-chubbs.

name: norrin
text: I like how Lyle assumes they're about to get nasty, yet his only concern is that it not happen on the couch.

name: shemmjacc
text: The first time I saw this I thought Cornelius' tie was a crude dong

name: meganasty
text: What the hell, man?

name: bourbonsamurai
text: This is before Onstad decided he liked drawing dongs at any possible excuse.

name: simon-eo
text: What is kermit doing in panel 5? Wierd.

name: orvel
text: Grunting.

name: heccibiggs
text: I'd say he looks more like Zippy from Rainbow .

name: zapatos
text: Is Zippy into BDSM?  He seems like he evolved into it.

name: tekende
text: Teodor had some fun little tits that day!

name: snowman
text:
Lyle's sensibilities were offended.

Great Mr. Furley moment here.

name: folby
text: Is T wearing a henley to go jogging?

name: redmange
text: Sweet jesus guys, not on the sofa.  You know that's the good sofa.  They paid like 350 for that sofa, and you are just going to have hot sweat man love on it.  You should be ashamed.

name: farqussus
text: The dog got pregnant on it, why can't they get naked?

name: biznart
text: Getting dude-sweat on the sofa is a no-no, but man-douching with cookware is perfectly acceptable.  Lyle is complicated.

name: em2
text: Teodor still has issues to work out.

name: nicejames
text: Teodor kicks ass.  He cooks and he jogs.  I'd take him for a roommate any time.

name: keir
text: This is the only strip with an actual punchline (that I can think of right now.)

name: milo
text: Achewood does coming in at the wrong part of the conversation the best

name: mizzip
text: "Not on the sofa" is the rule at my apartment also.

name: puguglypress
text: Three's Company is the stupidest source of comedic inspiration.
